pli-tv-pvr2.3:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr2.3:1.1: Of the four fallings away how many fallings away do the offences for a nun who, filled with desire, is consenting to physical contact with a man who is filled with desire appertain to?
pli-tv-pvr2.3:1.2: Of the four fallings away the offences … appertain to two fallings away:
pli-tv-pvr2.3:1.3: there may be falling away from moral habit; there may be falling away from good behaviour …
pli-tv-pvr2.3:2.1: Of the four fallings away how many fallings away do the offences for one who is partaking of curds, having had them asked for, appertain to?
pli-tv-pvr2.3:3.1: Concluded is the Third Chapter: on Falling Away
